column3:
MS7.1 - Minotaur AVS: Enable SPOs to Customize Rewards
Deliverables: Validator can set custom fees applicable to a particular network, displayed with the Validators info in the Discover Validators webUI component

MS7.2 - Minotaur AVS: Assured liveness of the network
Deliverables: Tests with runtime properties. Documentation and tutorials

MS7.3 - Minotaur AVS: Enable and support launch of first PC (Midnight) unlocking new revenue opportunities to validators
Deliverables: Native Token Reserve as Cardano native asset. Enable governance management on Cardano

MS7.4 - Minotaur AVS: Clear UI/UX & online presence for onboarding validators
Deliverables: Intuitive user experience. Dedicated Web Portal to Facilitate Validator Onboarding and Partner Chain Integration

MS7.5 - Minotaur AVS V1 feature set release
Deliverables: Custom Fee settings. Automatic reward distribution (for Validators and Delegators). Transparent Reward Calculations

MS8.1 - Mithril: Decentralized Mithril Signature Diffusion - Prototype
Deliverables: N2C mini-protocols in Mithril signer and Cardano node. DMQ side-car node

MS8.2 - Mithril: Mithril Support for UTXO HD
Deliverables: Support for current and new in- memory ledger state. Support for on disc ledger state

MS8.3 - Mithril: Decentralized Mithril Signature Diffusion - Mainnet
Deliverables: Production ready p2p network based on DMQ. Signer communication through DMQ nodes. Aggregator communication through DMQ nodes

MS8.4 - Mithril: Multiple Mithril Aggregators - Mainnet
Deliverables: Updated Mithril protocol and mainnet deployment supporting multiple aggregators. Production-grade ALBA Aggregator, documentation, and operational guidelines.

MS8.5 - Mithril: Mithril ZK proofs - Prototype
Deliverables: ZKP-enhanced Mithril prototype, prototype testnet reports.

MS8.6 - Mithril: Mithril/Cardano Integration
Deliverables: Integrated codebase, binaries, integration documentation, and testnet/mainnet deployment.

MS8.7 - Mithril: Mithril ZK proofs - Mainnet
Deliverables: ZKP-enhanced Mithril release, mainnet rollout report, and updated documentation.

MS8.8 - Mithril: Mithril Certificates for new datatypes
Deliverables: Updated Mithril protocol and support modules for new datatypes.

MS9.1 - KES Agent: Development of KES Agent
Deliverables: Integration code submitted, Comms, tutorials, guides, support

MS9.2 - KES Agent: Integration of KES Agent to the Node (as a beta feature)
Deliverables: Report demonstrating readiness

MS9.3 - KES Agent: The KES Agent integrated into the Node passing P&T and Testing
Deliverables: P&T and Testing reports

MS9.4 - KES Agent: Releasing Node version that includes the KES Agent as a beta feature
Deliverables: New release in cardano-node github repo

MS9.5 - KES Agent: passing an audit
Deliverables: Community update on the result of the audit.

MS9.6 - KES Agent: Support the beta-users, obtain feedback and release patches as needed.
Deliverables: Receive feedback from community and release patches as needed

MS9.7 - KES Agent: Upgrade the KES Agent to 1.0
Deliverables: Node version release
